text.1347: [03] 398^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa ^a^T1.0153^ea^ ^a^V1.0152^ea^ ^a^M1.0131^ea^ dve, naadhipatiyaa tii.ni, napurejaate tii.ni, napacchaajaate  tii.ni, naaasevane tii.ni, nakamme tii.ni, navipaake tii.ni, najhaane eka.m, namagge eka.m,  navippayutte tii.ni. (sa.mkhitta.m.)
text.135: [03] 49^b^.^eb^ siyaa ^a^V1.0019^ea^ ^a^M1.0018^ea^ kusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya nahetupaccayaa  aaramma.napaccayaa. siyaa kusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya nahetupaccayaa  adhipatipaccayaa...pe0... nahetupaccayaa avigatapaccayaa.
text.1351: [03] 399^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naadhipatiyaa tii.ni, napurejaate tii.ni, napacchaajaate tii.ni, naaasevane  tii.ni, nakamme tii.ni, navipaake tii.ni, navippayutte tii.ni. (sa.mkhitta.m.)
text.1355: [03] 400^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa aaramma.ne dve, anantare dve, samanantare dve, sahajaate dve, a~n~nama~n~ne  dve, nissaye dve, upanissaye dve, purejaate dve, aasevane dve, kamme dve, vipaake  eka.m ^a^V1.0153^ea^, aahaare dve, indriye dve, jhaane dve, magge eka.m, sampayutte dve, vippayutte  dve, atthiyaa dve, natthiyaa dve, vigate dve, avigate dve. (sa.mkhitta.m.)
text.136: [03] 50^b^.^eb^ siyaa kusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya nahetupaccayaa naaaramma.napaccayaa  adhipatipaccayaa...pe0... avigatapaccayaa.
text.1362: [03] 401^b^.^eb^ kusalo ^a^T1.0154^ea^ ^a^M1.0132^ea^ dhammo kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo --   kusalaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. kusalo dhammo abyaakatassa  dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- kusalaa hetuu cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m hetupaccayena  paccayo. kusalo dhammo kusalassa ca abyaakatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo --  kusalaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo.  (3)
text.1363: [03] 402^b^.^eb^ akusalo dhammo akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- akusalaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m  khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. akusalo dhammo abyaakatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena  paccayo -- akusalaa hetuu cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. akusalo  dhammo akusalassa ca abyaakatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- akusalaa hetuu  sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.1364: [03] 403^b^.^eb^ abyaakato dhammo abyaakatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- vipaakaabyaakataa  kiriyaabyaakataa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena  ^a^V1.0154^ea^ paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne vipaakaabyaakataa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa  ca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena ^a^T1.0155^ea^ paccayo. (1)
text.1366: [03] 404^b^.^eb^ kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa siila.m  samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani paccavekkhati,  jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m paccavekkhati, sekkhaa gotrabhu.m paccavekkhanti, vodaana.m  paccavekkhanti, sekkhaa maggaa ^a^M1.0133^ea^ vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti, sekkhaa  vaa puthujjanaa vaa kusala.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, cetopariya~naa.nena  kusalacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaananti. aakaasaana~ncaayatanakusala.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanakusalassa  aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. aaki~nca~n~naayatanakusala.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanakusalassa aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo. kusalaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa cetopariya~naa.nassa pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa  yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa anaagata.msa~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.1367: [03] 405^b^.^eb^ kusalo dhammo akusalassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa siila.m  samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati,  di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa uppajjati, uddhacca.m uppajjati, domanassa.m uppajjati.  pubbe suci.n.naani assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati,  vicikicchaa uppajjati, uddhacca.m uppajjati, domanassa.m uppajjati. jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa  jhaana.m assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha ^a^T1.0156^ea^ raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa  uppajjati, uddhacca.m uppajjati. jhaane parihiine vippa.tisaarissa domanassa.m uppajjati.  (2)
text.1368: [03] 406^b^.^eb^ kusalo dhammo abyaakatassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- arahaa maggaa  vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhati; pubbe suci.n.naani paccavekkhati; kusala.m aniccato  dukkhato anattato vippassati; cetopariya~naa.nena kusalacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati.  sekkhaa vaa puthujjanaa vaa kusala.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, kusale  niruddhe vipaako ^a^V1.0155^ea^ tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati. kusala.m assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha  raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa uppajjati, uddhacca.m uppajjati,  domanassa.m uppajjati, akusale niruddhe vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati. aakaasaana~ncaayatanakusala.m  vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanavipaakassa ca, kiriyassa ca aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. aaki~nca~n~naayatanakusala.m  nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanavipaakassa ca, kiriyassa ca aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. kusalaa  khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa,  aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.1369: [03] 407^b^.^eb^ akusalo ^a^M1.0134^ea^ dhammo akusalassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- raaga.m  assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa  uppajjati, uddhacca.m uppajjati, domanassa.m uppajjati ^a^T1.0157^ea^. di.t.thi.m assaadeti abhinandati;  ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa uppajjati, uddhacca.m  uppajjati, domanassa.m uppajjati. vicikiccha.m aarabbha vicikicchaa uppajjati, di.t.thi  uppajjati, uddhacca.m uppajjati, domanassa.m uppajjati. uddhacca.m aarabbha uddhacca.m uppajjati,  di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa uppajjati, domanassa.m uppajjati. domanassa.m aarabbha domanassa.m  uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa uppajjati, uddhacca.m uppajjati. (1)
text.1370: [03] 408^b^.^eb^ akusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- sekkhaa  pahiine kilese {pahiinakilese (syaa0)}  paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese {vikkhambhitakilese (syaa0)} paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese  jaananti, sekkhaa vaa puthujjanaa vaa akusala.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti,  cetopariya~naa.nena akusalacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaananti. akusalaa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa,  pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa anaagata.msa~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo. (2)
text.1371: [03] 409^b^.^eb^ akusalo dhammo abyaakatassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- arahaa pahiine  kilese paccavekkhati, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaanaati, akusala.m aniccato  dukkhato anattato vipassati, cetopariya~naa.nena akusalacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati,  sekkhaa vaa puthujjanaa vaa akusala.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti  ^a^T1.0158^ea^, kusale niruddhe ^a^V1.0156^ea^ vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati. akusala.m assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m  aarabbha raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa uppajjati, uddhacca.m uppajjati,  domanassa.m uppajjati. akusale niruddhe vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati. akusalaa  khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa anaagata.msa~naa.nassa  aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.1372: [03] 410^b^.^eb^ abyaakato dhammo abyaakatassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- arahaa phala.m  paccavekkhati, nibbaana.m paccavekkhati. nibbaana.m phalassa aavajjanaaya ^a^M1.0135^ea^  aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. arahaa cakkhu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati.  sota.m... ghaana.m... jivha.m... kaaya.m... ruupe... sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe...  vatthu.m... vipaakaabyaakate kiriyaabyaakate khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato  vipassati, dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, cetopariya~naa.nena  vipaakaabyaakatakiriyaabyaakatacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati. aakaasaana~ncaayatanakiriya.m  vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanakiriyassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. aaki~nca~n~naayatanakiriya.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanakiriyassa  aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. saddaayatana.m  sotavi~n~naa.nassa... gandhaayatana.m ghaanavi~n~naa.nassa... rasaayatana.m jivhaavi~n~naa.nassa  ^a^T1.0159^ea^... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. abyaakataa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa,  cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo. (1)
text.1373: [03] 411^b^.^eb^ abyaakato dhammo kusalassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- sekkhaa  phala.m paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti. nibbaana.m gotrabhussa vodaanassa maggassa  aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. sekkhaa vaa puthujjanaa vaa cakkhu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato  vippassanti. sota.m... ghaana.m... jivha.m... kaaya.m... ruupe... sadde... gandhe...  rase... pho.t.thabbe... vatthu.m... vipaakaabyaakate kiriyaabyaakate khandhe aniccato  dukkhato anattato vipassanti, dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passanti, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa  sadda.m su.nanti, cetopariya~naa.nena vipaakaabyaakatakiriyaabyaakatacittasama"ngissa citta.m  jaananti. abyaakataa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa ^a^V1.0157^ea^ cetopariya~naa.nassa pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa  anaagata.msa~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo.
text.1374: [03] 412^b^.^eb^ abyaakato dhammo akusalassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- cakkhu.m assaadeti  abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa uppajjati,  uddhacca.m uppajjati, domanassa.m uppajjati. sota.m... ghaana.m... jivha.m... kaaya.m...  ruupe... sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... vatthu.m... vipaakaabyaakate kiriyaabyaakate  khandhe assaadeti abhinandati ^a^T1.0160^ea^; ta.m aarabbha raago ^a^M1.0136^ea^ uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati,  vicikicchaa uppajjati, uddhacca.m uppajjati, domanassa.m uppajjati. (3)
text.1376: [03] 413^b^.^eb^ kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati.  ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa, ta.m  garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, jhaanaa  vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati. sekkhaa gotrabhu.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti,  vodaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti. sekkhaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m garu.m katvaa  paccavekkhanti. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- kusalaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena  paccayo. (1)
text.1377: [03] 414^b^.^eb^ kusalo dhammo akusalassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ --  daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa, ta.m garu.m katvaa assaadeti  abhinandati; ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, pubbe suci.n.naani  garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati.  jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m garu.m katvaa raago  uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati.
text.1378: [03] kusalo dhammo abyaakatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati  ^a^V1.0158^ea^. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- arahaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati.  ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ ^a^T1.0161^ea^ -- kusalaadhipati cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. text.1387: [03] 417^b^.^eb^ kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa kusalaa  khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m kusalaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena ^a^M1.0138^ea^ paccayo.  anuloma.m gotrabhussa... anuloma.m vodaanassa... gotrabhu maggassa... vodaana.m maggassa  anantarapaccayena paccayo. text.154: [03] akusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- akusala.m eka.m khandha.m  pa.ticca tayo khandhaa, tayo khandhe pa.ticca eko khandho, dve khandhe pa.ticca dve khandhaa.  akusala.m ^a^V1.0021^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca abyaakato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- akusale khandhe  pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m. akusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca akusalo ca abyaakato ca dhammaa  uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- akusala.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca  ruupa.m, tayo khandhe pa.ticca eko khandho cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m, dve khandhe pa.ticca dve khandhaa  cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m. (3)

(1)

text.2823: [03] 38^b^.^eb^ sukhaaya ^a^V1.0346^ea^ ^a^M1.0306^ea^ vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa  dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m  khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa hetuu  sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.2824: [03] dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena  paccayo -- dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena  paccayo. (1)
text.2825: [03] adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa  hetupaccayena paccayo -- adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m  khandhaana.m hetupaccayena ^a^T1.0374^ea^ paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa  hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.2827: [03] 39^b^.^eb^ sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo -- sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena daana.m datvaa, siila.m samaadiyitvaa,  uposathakamma.m katvaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena paccavekkhati. sukhaaya vedanaaya  sampayuttaa jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa, maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa, phalaa vu.t.thahitvaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena  cittena paccavekkhati. ariyaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena sukhaaya vedanaaya  sampayutte pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti ^a^V1.0347^ea^, pubbe  samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti. sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutte khandhe sukhaaya vedanaaya  sampayuttena cittena aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati;  ta.m aarabbha sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati; sukhaaya  ^a^M1.0307^ea^ vedanaaya sampayutte khandhe aarabbha sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa khandhaa uppajjanti.  (1)
text.2828: [03] sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo -- sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena daana.m datvaa, siila.m samaadiyitvaa,  uposathakamma.m katvaa vippa.tisaarissa domanassa.m uppajjati. sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutte  ^a^T1.0375^ea^ jhaane parihiine vippa.tisaarissa domanassa.m uppajjati. sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutte  khandhe aarabbha dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa khandhaa uppajjanti. (2)
text.2829: [03] sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa  aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena daana.m datvaa, siila.m  samaadiyitvaa, uposathakamma.m katvaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena paccavekkhati.  sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa, maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa, phalaa vu.t.thahitvaa  adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena paccavekkhati. ariyaa adukkhamasukhaaya  vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutte pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti,  vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti. sukhaaya  vedanaaya sampayutte khandhe adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena aniccato dukkhato  anattato vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto  raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa uppajjati, uddhacca.m uppajjati,  cetopariya~naa.nena sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati. sukhaaya  vedanaaya sampayuttaa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa,  anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo ^a^T1.0376^ea^. sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutte  khandhe aarabbha adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa khandhaa uppajjanti. (3)
text.283: [03] kusala~nca abyaakata~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca abyaakato dhammo uppajjati naaaramma.napaccayaa -- kusale  khandhe ca mahaabhuute ca pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m. (1)
text.2830: [03] 40^b^.^eb^ dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo dukkhaaya   vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena ^a^V1.0348^ea^   paccayo -- dosa.m aarabbha doso uppajjati, moho uppajjati; dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m  moha.m aarabbha moho uppajjati, doso uppajjati; dukkhasahagata.m kaayavi~n~naa.na.m aarabbha  ^a^M1.0308^ea^ doso uppajjati, moho uppajjati; dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutte khandhe  aarabbha dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa khandhaa uppajjanti. (1)
text.2831: [03] dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo -- ariyaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutte  pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne  kilese jaananti. dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutte khandhe sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena  cittena aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati; dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutte khandhe  aarabbha sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa khandhaa uppajjanti. (2)
text.2832: [03] dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo -- ariyaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutte  ^a^T1.0377^ea^ pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne  kilese jaananti. dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutte khandhe adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena  cittena aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati; cetopariya~naa.nena dukkhaaya vedanaaya  sampayuttacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaananti. dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa,  pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo -- dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutte khandhe aarabbha adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa  khandhaa uppajjanti. (3)
text.2833: [03] 41^b^.^eb^ adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa  dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena daana.m  datvaa, siila.m samaadiyitvaa, uposathakamma.m katvaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena  cittena paccavekkhati. adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa, maggaa  vu.t.thahitvaa, phalaa vu.t.thahitvaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena paccavekkhati;  ariyaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutte  pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese ^a^V1.0349^ea^ paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne  kilese jaananti. adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutte khandhe adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya  sampayuttena ^a^M1.0309^ea^ cittena ^a^T1.0378^ea^ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assaadeti  abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto raago uppajjati, di.t.thi  uppajjati, vicikicchaa uppajjati, uddhacca.m uppajjati; cetopariya~naa.nena adukkhamasukhaaya  vedanaaya sampayuttacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaananti. aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa  aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo. adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa,  pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo. adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutte khandhe aarabbha adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya  sampayuttaa khandhaa uppajjanti. (1)
text.2834: [03] adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo -- adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena daana.m datvaa, siila.m samaadiyitvaa,  uposathakamma.m katvaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena paccavekkhati. adukkhamasukhaaya  vedanaaya sampayuttaa jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa, maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa, phalaa vu.t.thahitvaa sukhaaya  vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena paccavekkhati. ariyaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena  cittena adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutte pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti  ^a^T1.0379^ea^, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti. adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya  sampayutte khandhe sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena aniccato dukkhato anattato  vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto raago  uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati; adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutte khandhe aarabbha sukhaaya  vedanaaya sampayuttaa khandhaa uppajjanti. (2)

text.2837: [03] 42^b^.^eb^ sukhaaya ^a^M1.0310^ea^ vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa  dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati.
text.2838: [03] ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena daana.m datvaa, siila.m samaadiyitvaa,  uposathakamma.m katvaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati.  sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa, maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa, phalaa vu.t.thahitvaa  ^a^T1.0380^ea^ sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati. sukhaaya vedanaaya  sampayutte khandhe sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati;  ta.m garu.m katvaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati.
text.2839: [03] ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena  paccayo. (1)

text.2848: [03] ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena daana.m datvaa, siila.m  samaadiyitvaa, uposathakamma.m katvaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena ta.m garu.m  katvaa paccavekkhati. adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa, maggaa  vu.t.thahitvaa, phalaa vu.t.thahitvaa ^a^T1.0382^ea^ sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena ta.m garu.m katvaa  paccavekkhati. adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutte khandhe sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena  cittena garu.m katvaa assaadeti ^a^V1.0352^ea^ abhinandati; ta.m garu.m katvaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto  raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. text.2850: [03] 45^b^.^eb^ sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena  paccayo -- purimaa purimaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m  sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. sukhaaya vedanaaya  sampayutta.m ^a^M1.0312^ea^ anuloma.m sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa gotrabhussa anantarapaccayena  paccayo, anuloma.m vodaanassa... gotrabhu maggassa... vodaana.m maggassa... maggo  phalassa... phala.m phalassa... anuloma.m sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaaya phalasamaapattiyaa  anantarapaccayena paccayo. sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa khandhaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa  vu.t.thaanassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.2851: [03] sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena  paccayo -- sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m cuticitta.m adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa  upapatticittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m bhava"nga.m aavajjanaaya  anantarapaccayena paccayo. sukhasahagata.m kaayavi~n~naa.na.m ^a^T1.0383^ea^ vipaakamanodhaatuyaa anantarapaccayena  paccayo. sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa vipaakamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatu kiriyamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa  anantarapaccayena paccayo. sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m bhava"nga.m adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya  sampayuttassa bhava"ngassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m kusalaakusala.m  adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa vu.t.thaanassa... kiriya.m vu.t.thaanassa... phala.m vu.t.thaanassa  anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)

text.2854: [03] 47^b^.^eb^ adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa  dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa  khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena  ^a^T1.0384^ea^ paccayo ^a^M1.0313^ea^. adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m anuloma.m adukkhamasukhaaya  vedanaaya sampayuttassa gotrabhussa anantarapaccayena paccayo. anuloma.m vodaanassa...  gotrabhu maggassa... vodaana.m maggassa... maggo phalassa... phala.m phalassa... anuloma.m  phalasamaapattiyaa... nirodhaa vu.t.thahantassa nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya  sampayuttaaya phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa  khandhaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa vu.t.thaanassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.2855: [03] adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena  paccayo -- adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m cuticitta.m sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa  upapatticittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. aavajjanaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttakaana.m  khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. vipaakamanodhaatu sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaaya  vipaakamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m  bhava"nga.m sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa bhava"ngassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. adukkhamasukhaaya  vedanaaya sampayutta.m kusalaakusala.m sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa vu.t.thaanassa... kiriya.m  vu.t.thaanassa... phala.m vu.t.thaanassa... nirodhaa vu.t.thahantassa nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m sukhaaya  vedanaaya sampayuttaaya phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.2856: [03] adukkhamasukhaaya ^a^T1.0385^ea^ vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena  paccayo -- aavajjanaa dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo.  (3)
text.2858: [03] 48^b^.^eb^ sukhaaya ^a^V1.0354^ea^ vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena  paccayo (anantarapaccayasadisa.m).
text.286: [03] 88^b^.^eb^ kusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca kusalo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayaa -- kusala.m eka.m  khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa, tayo khandhe pa.ticca eko khandho, dve khandhe pa.ticca dve khandhaa.  kusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca abyaakato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayaa -- kusale khandhe pa.ticca  cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m. kusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca kusalo ca abyaakato ca dhammaa uppajjanti  naadhipatipaccayaa -- kusala.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m, tayo  khandhe pa.ticca eko khandho cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m, dve khandhe pa.ticca dve  ^a^T1.0043^ea^ khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m. (3)
text.2860: [03] 49^b^.^eb^ sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena  paccayo -- sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto ^a^M1.0314^ea^ eko khandho dvinna.m khandhaana.m  sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. dve khandhaa ekassa khandhassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne  sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto eko khandho dvinna.m khandhaana.m sahajaatapaccayena paccayo.  dve khandhaa ekassa khandhassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.2861: [03] 50^b^.^eb^ dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena  paccayo -- dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto eko khandho dvinna.m khandhaana.m sahajaatapaccayena  paccayo. dve khandhaa ekassa khandhassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. (dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttapa.tisandhi  na labbhati.) (1)
text.2862: [03] 51^b^.^eb^ adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa  dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo -- adukkhamasukhaaya ^a^T1.0386^ea^ vedanaaya sampayutto eko khandho  dvinna.m khandhaana.m sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. dve khandhaa ekassa khandhassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo.  pa.tisandhikkha.ne adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto eko khandho dvinna.m khandhaana.m sahajaatapaccayena  paccayo. dve khandhaa ekassa khandhassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.2864: [03] 52^b^.^eb^ sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa a~n~nama~n~napaccayena  paccayo... nissayapaccayena paccayo (a~n~nama~n~nampi nissayampi sahajaatapaccayasadisa.m).
text.2866: [03] 53^b^.^eb^ sukhaaya ^a^V1.0355^ea^ vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena  paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0....^eb^
text.2867: [03] pakatuupanissayo -- sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m saddha.m upanissaaya sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena  cittena daana.m deti, siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m karoti, sukhaaya vedanaaya  sampayutta.m jhaana.m uppaadeti, vipassana.m ^a^M1.0315^ea^ uppaadeti, magga.m uppaadeti,  samaapatti.m uppaadeti, maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati. sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m  siila.m... suta.m... caaga.m... pa~n~na.m... raaga.m... moha.m... maana.m... di.t.thi.m...  patthana.m... sukhasahagata.m kaayavi~n~naa.na.m upanissaaya sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena  daana.m deti...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti (saddhaapa~ncamakesu ``maana.m jappeti,  di.t.thi.m ga.nhaatii''ti kaatabba.m, avasesesu ^a^T1.0387^ea^ na kaatabba.m). sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena  cittena adinna.m aadiyati, musaa bha.nati, pisu.na.m bha.nati, sampha.m palapati, sandhi.m  chindati, nillopa.m harati, ekaagaarika.m karoti, paripanthe ti.t.thati, paradaara.m gacchati,  gaamaghaata.m karoti, nigamaghaata.m karoti. sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa saddhaa... siila.m...  suta.m... caago... pa~n~naa... raago... moho... maano... di.t.thi... patthanaa...  sukhasahagata.m kaayavi~n~naa.na.m sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaaya saddhaaya... siilassa... sutassa...  caagassa... pa~n~naaya... raagassa... mohassa... maanassa... di.t.thiyaa... patthanaaya... sukhasahagatassa  kaayavi~n~naa.nassa... sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m upanissayapaccayena paccayo.  (1)
text.2868: [03] sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena  paccayo.
text.2869: [03] ^b^pakatuupanissayo^eb^ -- sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m saddha.m upanissaaya attaana.m aataapeti  paritaapeti, pariyi.t.thimuulaka.m dukkha.m paccanubhoti. sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m  siila.m... suta.m... caaga.m... pa~n~na.m upanissaaya attaana.m aataapeti paritaapeti,  pariyi.t.thimuulaka.m dukkha.m paccanubhoti. sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m raaga.m... moha.m...  maana.m... di.t.thi.m... patthana.m... sukhasahagata.m kaayavi~n~naa.na.m upanissaaya paa.na.m hanati.  dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena adinna.m aadiyati, musaa bha.nati ^a^V1.0356^ea^, pisu.na.m bha.nati,  pharusa.m bha.nati, sampha.m palapati, sandhi.m chindati, nillopa.m harati, ekaagaarika.m  karoti, paripanthe ^a^T1.0388^ea^ ti.t.thati, paradaara.m gacchati, gaamaghaata.m karoti, nigamaghaata.m karoti,  maatara.m jiivitaa voropeti, pitara.m jiivitaa voropeti, arahanta.m jiivitaa voropeti,  du.t.thena cittena tathaagatassa lohita.m uppaadeti, sa"ngha.m bhindati. sukhaaya vedanaaya  sampayuttaa saddhaa... siila.m... suta.m... caago... pa~n~naa... raago... moho...  maano... di.t.thi... patthanaa... sukhasahagata.m kaayavi~n~naa.na.m dosassa... mohassa...  dukkhasahagatassa kaayavi~n~naa.nassa... dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m upanissayapaccayena  paccayo. (2)
text.287: [03] akusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca akusalo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayaa -- akusala.m eka.m khandha.m  pa.ticca tayo khandhaa, tayo khandhe pa.ticca eko khandho, dve khandhe pa.ticca dve khandhaa.  akusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca abyaakato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayaa -- akusale khandhe  pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m. akusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca akusalo ca abyaakato ca dhammaa  uppajjanti naadhipatipaccayaa -- akusala.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca  ruupa.m, tayo khandhe pa.ticca eko khandho cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m, dve khandhe pa.ticca dve khandhaa  cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m. (3)

text.3186: [03] 49^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa dasa, naaaramma.ne pa~nca, naadhipatiyaa terasa, naanantare pa~nca, nasamanantare  pa~nca, naa~n~nama~n~ne pa~nca, naupanissaye pa~nca, napurejaate ^a^M1.0347^ea^ dvaadasa, napacchaajaate  terasa, naaasevane terasa, nakamme dve, navipaake pa~nca, naaahaare eka.m, naindriye eka.m,  najhaane dve, namagge nava, nasampayutte pa~nca, navippayutte tii.ni, nonatthiyaa pa~nca, novigate  pa~nca.
text.3188: [03] 50^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa dasa, naanantare tii.ni, nasamanantare  tii.ni, naa~n~nama~n~ne tii.ni, naupanissaye tii.ni, napurejaate dasa, napacchaajaate dasa, naaasevane  dasa, nakamme eka.m, navipaake dve, naaahaare eka.m, naindriye eka.m, najhaane dve, namagge  nava, nasampayutte tii.ni, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni.

text.3190: [01] nahetupaccayaa ^a^V1.0394^ea^ naaaramma.napaccayaa naadhipatiyaa tii.ni, naanantare tii.ni, nasamanantare tii.ni...pe0...  nakamme eka.m, navipaake eka.m, naaahaare eka.m, naindriye eka.m, najhaane eka.m, namagge  tii.ni, nasampayutte tii.ni, navippayutte eka.m, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni (sa.mkhitta.m).

text.32: [03] cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m ^a^T1.0007^ea^ nissayapaccayena  ^a^V1.0006^ea^ paccayo. sotaayatana.m sotavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo.  ghaanaayatana.m ghaanavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo.  jivhaayatana.m jivhaavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo.  kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo.  ya.m ruupa.m nissaaya manodhaatu ca manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu ca vattanti, ta.m ruupa.m manodhaatuyaa ca manovi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa  ca ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo.

text.338: [03] 103^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa ^a^M1.0039^ea^ ^a^V1.0044^ea^ dve, naaaramma.ne pa~nca, naadhipatiyaa nava, naanantare pa~nca,  nasamanantare pa~nca, naa~n~nama~n~ne pa~nca, naupanissaye pa~nca, napurejaate satta, napacchaajaate nava,  naaasevane nava, nakamme tii.ni, navipaake nava, naaahaare eka.m, naindriye eka.m, najhaane  eka.m, namagge eka.m, nasampayutte pa~nca, navippayutte tii.ni, nonatthiyaa pa~nca, novigate  pa~nca.
text.3380: [03] 90^b^.^eb^ vipaako dhammo vipaakassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- vipaakaa hetuu  sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne vipaakaa hetuu sappayuttakaana.m  khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3381: [03] vipaako dhammo nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammassa hetupaccayena ^a^T1.0446^ea^ paccayo -- vipaakaa hetuu  cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ^a^V1.0414^ea^ ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne vipaakaa hetuu ka.tattaaruupaana.m  hetupaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.3382: [03] vipaako dhammo vipaakassa ca nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammassa ca hetupaccayena paccayo --  vipaakaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo;  pa.tisandhikkha.ne vipaakaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena  paccayo. (3)
text.3383: [03] 91^b^.^eb^ vipaakadhammadhammo vipaakadhammadhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- vipaakadhammadhammaa  hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3384: [03] vipaakadhammadhammo nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- vipaakadhammadhammaa  hetuu cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.3385: [03] vipaakadhammadhammo ^a^M1.0364^ea^ vipaakadhammadhammassa ca nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammassa  ca hetupaccayena paccayo -- vipaakadhammadhammaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca  ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.3386: [03] nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammo nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo --  nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m  hetupaccayena paccayo.
text.3388: [03] 92^b^.^eb^ vipaako dhammo vipaakassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo  ^a^T1.0447^ea^ -- vipaake khandhe  aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha raago  uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa uppajjati, uddhacca.m uppajjati, domanassa.m  uppajjati, kusalaakusale niruddhe vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati. (1)
text.3389: [03] vipaako ^a^V1.0415^ea^ dhammo vipaakadhammadhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- sekkhaa phala.m paccavekkhanti,  vipaake khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assaadenti abhinandanti;  ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, cetopariya~naa.nena vipaakacittasama"ngissa  citta.m jaananti. vipaakaa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa,  anaagata.msa~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.3390: [03] vipaako dhammo nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- arahaa  phala.m paccavekkhati, vipaake khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, cetopariya~naa.nena  vipaakacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati. vipaakaa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa,  anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.3391: [03] 93^b^.^eb^ vipaakadhammadhammo vipaakadhammadhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa  siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani paccavekkhati,  jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m paccavekkhati, sekkhaa gotrabhu.m paccavekkhanti, vodaana.m  paccavekkhanti ^a^T1.0448^ea^, sekkhaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti, sekkhaa pahiine kilese  paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti ^a^M1.0365^ea^, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne  kilese jaananti, vipaakadhammadhamme khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti,  assaadenti abhinandanti; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati,  cetopariya~naa.nena vipaakadhammadhammacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaananti. aakaasaana~ncaayatanakusala.m  vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanakusalassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. aaki~nca~n~naayatanakusala.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanakusalassa  aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. vipaakadhammadhammaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa,  pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo. (1)
text.3392: [03] vipaakadhammadhammo vipaakassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- vipaakadhammadhamme khandhe  aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assaadenti abhinandanti; ta.m aarabbha raago  uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, kusalaakusale niruddhe vipaako tadaaramma.nataa  uppajjati. aakaasaana~ncaayatanakusala.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanavipaakassa aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo ^a^V1.0416^ea^. aaki~nca~n~naayatanakusala.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanavipaakassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo.  (2)
text.3393: [03] vipaakadhammadhammo nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- arahaa  maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani paccavekkhati. arahaa pahiine  ^a^T1.0449^ea^ kilese paccavekkhati, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaanaati, vipaakadhammadhamme khandhe  aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, cetopariya~naa.nena vipaakadhammadhammacittasama"ngissa  citta.m jaanaati. aakaasaana~ncaayatanakusala.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanakiriyassa aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo. aaki~nca~n~naayatanakusala.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanakiriyassa aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo. vipaakadhammadhammaa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa,  anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.3394: [03] 94^b^.^eb^ nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammo nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammassa aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo -- arahaa nibbaana.m paccavekkhati. nibbaana.m aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo. arahaa cakkhu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati. sota.m... ghaana.m...  jivha.m... kaaya.m... ruupe... sadde... gandhe... rase ^a^M1.0366^ea^... pho.t.thabbe...  vatthu.m... nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhamme khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati,  dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, cetopariya~naa.nena  nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati. aakaasaana~ncaayatanakiriya.m  vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanakiriyassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. aaki~nca~n~naayatanakiriya.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanakiriyassa  aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa,  cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa ^a^T1.0450^ea^, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo. (1)
text.3395: [03] nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammo vipaakassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- nibbaana.m  phalassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. sekkhaa vaa puthujjanaa vaa cakkhu.m aniccato dukkhato  anattato vipassanti, assaadenti abhinandanti; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0...  domanassa.m uppajjati. kusalaakusale niruddhe vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati.  sota.m... ghaana.m... jivha.m... kaaya.m... ruupe... sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe...  vatthu.m... nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhamme ^a^V1.0417^ea^ khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti,  assaadenti abhinandanti; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati.  kusalaakusale niruddhe vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati. ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0...  pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.3396: [03] nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammo vipaakadhammadhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- sekkhaa  nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti; nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo. sekkhaa vaa puthujjanaa vaa cakkhu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti,  assaadenti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati.  sota.m...pe0... nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhamme khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti,  assaadenti abhinandanti...pe0... dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passanti, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa  sadda.m ^a^T1.0451^ea^ su.nanti, cetopariya~naa.nena nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammacittasama"ngissa citta.m  jaananti. nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa,  pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.3398: [03] 95^b^.^eb^ vipaako ^a^M1.0367^ea^ dhammo vipaakassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ --  vipaakaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3399: [03] vipaako dhammo vipaakadhammadhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ --  sekkhaa phala.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, vipaake khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadenti  abhinandanti; ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. (2)
text.34: [03] purimaa purimaa akusalaa dhammaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m upanissayapaccayena  paccayo. purimaa purimaa akusalaa dhammaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m  kesa~nci upanissayapaccayena paccayo. purimaa purimaa akusalaa dhammaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m  abyaakataana.m dhammaana.m upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
text.340: [03] 104^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa ^a^T1.0051^ea^ naaaramma.ne eka.m, naadhipatiyaa dve, naanantare eka.m, nasamanantare  eka.m, naa~n~nama~n~ne eka.m, naupanissaye eka.m, napurejaate dve, napacchaajaate dve, naaasevane  dve, nakamme eka.m, navipaake dve, naaahaare eka.m, naindriye eka.m, najhaane eka.m,  namagge eka.m, nasampayutte eka.m, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyaa eka.m, novigate eka.m.
text.3400: [03] vipaako ^a^V1.0418^ea^ dhammo nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati,  sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- arahaa phala.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati.  ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- vipaakaadhipati cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo.  (3)
text.3401: [03] vipaako dhammo vipaakassa ca nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammassa ca adhipatipaccayena paccayo.  ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- vipaakaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m  adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (4)
text.3402: [03] 96^b^.^eb^ vipaakadhammadhammo vipaakadhammadhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati,  sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m  katvaa ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati ^a^T1.0452^ea^, pubbe suci.n.naani garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati,  jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, sekkhaa gotrabhu.m garu.m katvaa  paccavekkhanti, vodaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, sekkhaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m  garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, vipaakadhammadhamme khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadenti abhinandanti;  ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati,. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- vipaakadhammadhammaadhipati  sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3403: [03] vipaakadhammadhammo nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati,  sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- arahaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m garu.m katvaa  paccavekkhati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- vipaakadhammadhammaadhipati cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m  adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.3404: [03] vipaakadhammadhammo ^a^M1.0368^ea^ vipaakadhammadhammassa ca nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammassa  ca adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- vipaakadhammadhammaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m  khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.3405: [03] nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammo nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo --  aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- arahaa nibbaana.m garu.m  katvaa paccavekkhati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m  khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3406: [03] nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammo ^a^T1.0453^ea^ ^a^V1.0419^ea^ vipaakassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ --  nibbaana.m phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.3407: [03] nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammo vipaakadhammadhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ --  sekkhaa nibbaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti. nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa,  maggassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. cakkhu.m garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m  garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. sota.m...pe0... nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhamme  khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi  uppajjati. (3)
text.3409: [03] 97^b^.^eb^ vipaako dhammo vipaakassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa  vipaakaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo.  pa~ncavi~n~naa.na.m vipaakamanodhaatuyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. vipaakamanodhaatu vipaakamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa  anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3410: [03] vipaako dhammo nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. bhava"nga.m aavajjanaaya  anantarapaccayena paccayo. vipaakamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatu kiriyamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa anantarapaccayena  paccayo. (2)
text.3411: [03] vipaakadhammadhammo vipaakadhammadhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa vipaakadhammadhammaa  khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m vipaakadhammadhammaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. anuloma.m  gotrabhussa ^a^T1.0454^ea^... anuloma.m vodaanassa... gotrabhu maggassa... vodaana.m maggassa anantarapaccayena  paccayo. (1)
text.3412: [03] vipaakadhammadhammo ^a^M1.0369^ea^ vipaakassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- vipaakadhammadhammaa  khandhaa ^a^V1.0420^ea^ vu.t.thaanassa... maggo phalassa... sekkhaana.m anuloma.m phalasamaapattiyaa... nirodhaa  vu.t.thahantassa nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanakusala.m phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo.  (2)
text.3413: [03] nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammo nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo --  purimaa purimaa nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammaana.m  khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3414: [03] nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammo vipaakassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- aavajjanaa  pa~ncanna.m vi~n~naa.naana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammaa khandhaa  vu.t.thaanassa, arahato anuloma.m phalasamaapattiyaa... nirodhaa vu.t.thahantassa nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanakiriya.m  phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.3415: [03] nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammo vipaakadhammadhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- aavajjanaa  vipaakadhammadhammaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.3417: [03] 98^b^.^eb^ vipaako dhammo vipaakassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo (anantarasadisa.m).
text.3419: [03] 99^b^.^eb^ vipaako dhammo vipaakassa dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo -- vipaako eko  khandho...pe0... tii.ni.
text.342: [03] 105^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa naaaramma.napaccayaa naadhipatiyaa eka.m, na anantare eka.m, nasamanantare  eka.m, naa~n~nama~n~ne eka.m, naupanissaye eka.m, napurejaate eka.m, napacchaajaate eka.m,  naaasevane eka.m, nakamme eka.m, navipaake eka.m, naaahaare eka.m, naindriye eka.m,  najhaane eka.m, namagge eka.m, nasampayutte eka.m, navippayutte eka.m, nonatthiyaa eka.m,  novigate eka.m...pe0....

(1)

text.3827: [03] 52^b^.^eb^ upaadinnupaadaaniyo ^a^M1.0408^ea^ dhammo upaadinnupaadaaniyassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo -- sekkhaa vaa puthujjanaa vaa cakkhu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti,  assaadenti abhinandanti; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati;  kusalaakusale niruddhe vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati. sota.m... ghaana.m... jivha.m...  kaaya.m... upaadinnupaadaaniye ruupe... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... vatthu.m...  upaadinnupaadaaniye khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vippassanti, assaadenti abhinandati;  ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. kusalaakusale niruddhe  vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati. upaadinnupaadaaniya.m ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0...  upaadinnupaadaaniya.m gandhaayatana.m... rasaayatana.m... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa  aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3828: [03] upaadinnupaadaaniyo dhammo anupaadinnupaadaaniyassa dhammassa ^a^T1.0501^ea^ aaramma.napaccayena paccayo --  cakkhu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha  raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. sota.m... ghaana.m... jivha.m... kaaya.m...  upaadinnupaadaaniye ruupe... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... vatthu.m... upaadinnupaadaaniye  khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha  raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. dibbena cakkhunaa upaadinnupaadaaniya.m  ruupa.m passati, cetopariya~naa.nena upaadinnupaadaaniyacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati.  upaadinnupaadaaniyaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa  anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.3829: [03] 53^b^.^eb^ anupaadinnupaadaaniyo dhammo anupaadinnupaadaaniyassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo -- daana.m datvaa, siila.m samaadiyitvaa, uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati,  pubbe suci.n.naani ^a^V1.0468^ea^ paccavekkhati, jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m paccavekkhati, ariyaa  gotrabhu.m paccavekkhanti, vodaana.m paccavekkhanti, ariyaa pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti,  vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti; anupaadinnupaadaaniye  ruupe... sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... anupaadinnupaadaaniye khandhe aniccato  dukkhato anattato ^a^M1.0409^ea^ vipassanti, assaadenti abhinandanti; ta.m aarabbha  raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. dibbena cakkhunaa anupaadinnupaadaaniya.m  ruupa.m passanti, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa ^a^T1.0502^ea^ sadda.m su.nanti, cetopariya~naa.nena anupaadinnupaadaaniyacittasama"ngissa  citta.m jaananti. aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo.  aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. anupaadinnupaadaaniyaa  khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa,  anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.383: [03] 125^b^.^eb^ nasampayuttapaccayaa nahetuyaa eka.m, naaaramma.ne pa~nca, (naaaramma.napaccayasadisa.m) novigate  pa~nca.
text.3830: [03] anupaadinnupaadaaniyo dhammo upaadinnupaadaaniyassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo --  sekkhaa vaa puthujjanaa vaa anupaadinnupaadaaniye ruupe... sadde... gandhe... rase...  pho.t.thabbe... anupaadinnupaadaaniye khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti,  assaadenti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati.  kusalaakusale niruddhe vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati. aakaasaana~ncaayatanakusala.m  vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanavipaakassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. aaki~nca~n~naayatanakusala.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanavipaakassa  aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. anupaadinnupaadaaniya.m ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0...  pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.3831: [03] 54^b^.^eb^ anupaadinnaanupaadaaniyo dhammo anupaadinnaanupaadaaniyassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo -- nibbaana.m maggassa, phalassa aaramma.napaccayena ^a^T1.0503^ea^ paccayo. (1)
text.3832: [03] anupaadinnaanupaadaaniyo dhammo anupaadinnupaadaaniyassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo --  ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti, phala.m paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti;  nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. ariyaa  cetopariya~naa.nena anupaadinnaanupaadaaniyacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaananti; anupaadinnaanupaadaaniyaa  ^a^V1.0469^ea^ khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya  aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.3834: [03] 55^b^.^eb^ upaadinnupaadaaniyo ^a^M1.0410^ea^ dhammo anupaadinnupaadaaniyassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena  paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- cakkhu.m garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m garu.m  katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. sota.m... ghaana.m... jivha.m... kaaya.m...  upaadinnupaadaaniye ruupe... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... vatthu.m... upaadinnupaadaaniye  khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi  uppajjati. (1)
text.3835: [03] anupaadinnupaadaaniyo dhammo anupaadinnupaadaaniyassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo --  aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m datvaa, siila.m  samaadiyitvaa, uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani  garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati; jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati; sekkhaa  gotrabhu.m garu.m ^a^T1.0504^ea^ katvaa paccavekkhanti, vodaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti. anupaadinnupaadaaniye  ruupe... sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... anupaadinnupaadaaniye khandhe garu.m  katvaa assaadenti abhinandanti; ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati.  ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- anupaadinnupaadaaniyaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca  ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3836: [03] anupaadinnaanupaadaaniyo dhammo anupaadinnaanupaadaaniyassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo --  aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- nibbaana.m maggassa phalassa  adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- anupaadinnaanupaadaaniyaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m  khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3837: [03] anupaadinnaanupaadaaniyo dhammo anupaadinnupaadaaniyassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo --  aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa  magga.m ^a^V1.0470^ea^ garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, phala.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m  garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti. nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.  ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- anupaadinnaanupaadaaniyaadhipati cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena  paccayo. text.3884: [03] 64^b^.^eb^ upaadinnupaadaaniyo ^a^V1.0478^ea^ ^a^M1.0418^ea^ dhammo upaadinnupaadaaniyassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena  paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- sekkhaa  vaa puthujjanaa vaa cakkhu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assaadenti  abhinandanti; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; kusalaakusale  niruddhe vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati. sota.m... ghaana.m... jivha.m... kaaya.m...  upaadinnupaadaaniye ruupe... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... vatthu.m aniccato dukkhato  anattato vipassanti, assaadenti abhinandanti; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0...  domanassa.m uppajjati. kusalaakusale niruddhe vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati.  upaadinnupaadaaniya.m ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... upaadinnupaadaaniya.m gandhaayatana.m...  rasaayatana.m... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ --  cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... vatthu  upaadinnupaadaaniyaana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. text.3980: [03] anupaadinnupaadaaniyo dhammo upaadinnupaadaaniyassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo --  purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- anupaadinnupaadaaniye ruupe...  sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assaadeti  abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. kusalaakusale  niruddhe vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati. anupaadinnupaadaaniya.m ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0...  pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- anupaadinnupaadaaniyaa  khandhaa purejaatassa imassa upaadinnupaadaaniyassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. anupaadinnupaadaaniyo  ^b^kaba.liikaaro aahaaro^eb^ upaadinnupaadaaniyassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. text.4098: [03] 10^b^.^eb^ asa.mkili.t.thasa.mkilesiko dhammo asa.mkili.t.thasa.mkilesikassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo -- daana.m datvaa, siila.m samaadiyitvaa ^a^T1.0554^ea^, uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati,  pubbe suci.n.naani paccavekkhati; jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m paccavekkhati, ariyaa  gotrabhu.m paccavekkhanti, vodaana.m paccavekkhanti, cakkhu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato  vipassanti ^a^V1.0510^ea^; sota.m... ghaana.m... jivha.m... kaaya.m... ruupe... sadde... gandhe...  rase... pho.t.thabbe... vatthu.m asa.mkili.t.thasa.mkilesike khandhe aniccato dukkhato  anattato vipassanti; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passanti, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m  su.nanti, cetopariya~naa.nena asa.mkili.t.thasa.mkilesikacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaananti.  aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa  aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo...pe0...  pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. asa.mkili.t.thasa.mkilesikaa  khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa ^a^M1.0447^ea^, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa,  yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.4099: [03] asa.mkili.t.thasa.mkilesiko dhammo sa.mkili.t.thasa.mkilesikassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo -- daana.m datvaa, siila.m samaadiyitvaa, uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m assaadeti  abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati;  pubbe suci.n.naani assaadeti...pe0... jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m assaadeti...pe0...  cakkhu.m assaadeti ^a^T1.0555^ea^. pho.t.thabbe... vatthu.m... asa.mkili.t.thasa.mkilesike khandhe assaadeti  abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati... domanassa.m uppajjati. text.632: [03] 234^b^.^eb^ kusala.m ^a^V1.0075^ea^ ^a^M1.0066^ea^ dhamma.m sahajaato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa --  kusala.m eka.m khandha.m sahajaataa tayo khandhaa, tayo khandhe sahajaato eko khandho, dve khandhe  sahajaataa dve khandhaa. kusala.m dhamma.m sahajaato abyaakato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa --  kusale khandhe sahajaata.m cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m. kusala.m dhamma.m sahajaato kusalo  ^a^T1.0081^ea^ ca abyaakato  ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- kusala.m eka.m khandha.m sahajaataa tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca  ruupa.m, tayo khandhe sahajaato eko khandho cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m, dve khandhe sahajaataa dve  khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m. (3)
